# Repository for simulations of the paper submitted to SBRC 2026

## X and Y coordinates generated by the code in the `coords.py` file

- **200**: 200 SM coordinates and GW coordinates for scenarios with 1 to 28 GWs
- **400**: 400 SM coordinates and GW coordinates for scenarios with 1 to 28 GWs
- **600**: 600 SM coordinates and GW coordinates for scenarios with 1 to 28 GWs
- **800**: 800 SM coordinates and GW coordinates for scenarios with 1 to 28 GWs
- **1000**: 1000 SM coordinates and GW coordinates for scenarios with 1 to 28 GWs

## NS-3 script for simulations of the LoRaWAN network and allocation mechanism: `sbrc26.cc`

## Python script to automate tests of the allocation mechanisms: `sbrc26.py`

## LoRaWAN module repository: [Access here](https://github.com/signetlabdei/lorawan)
